addEmptyTranscriptionPane(String) - Method in class de.upb.t2t.control.database.editing.EditDatabaseDialogue
Adds an empty AddTranscriptionPane to the EditDatabaseDialogue.itemsBox, meaning that the respective constructor will be called with a newly-created DatabaseEntry causing the transcription pane to be initialised with empty values.
